name: Scrap book: A doodle quest!
description:
In this game you are Jun, a dragon made out of paper who ventures to look for a great cover image, but his powers come from paper, so once she spits fire, the spacee where she can move is reduced.
Defeat your enemies to conquer more space and discover all the hidden drawings that are waiting for you!!!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD to move Jun the dragon

Use Space to shoot fireballs.

Gameplay:

Everytime you shoot, the space you are in is being reduced. 

Killing enemies will increase the space.

Taking lives will also increase the space.
